summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAvène's Tolerance Extremely Gentle Cleanser Lotion is a no-rinse, wipe-off formula helps restore skin barrier while protecting from dryness. Helps soothe skin discomfort, including tingling, burning sensations and tightness. Safe for face and eyes.
details: DetailsBenefits86% reduction in skin irritability immediately after applicationIngredients are 99% of natural originHigh tolerance demonstrated in children (2+ years) and adultsKey IngredientsD-Sensinose postbiotic ingredient derived from Avène Thermal Spring Water helps calm all sensations of discomfort and restore skin's barrierItem 2586858How To UseApply with a cotton pad or with fingertips in a gentle circular motion. Gently tissue offPrecautions: For external use only.IngredientsAvene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Aquaphilus Dolomiae Extract Filtrate, Arginine, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetrimonium Bromide, Coco-Glucoside, Disodium Phosphate, Hydroxycapric Acid, Magnesium Oxide, Potassium Phosphate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tromethamine.
how_to_use: Apply with a cotton pad or with fingertips in a gentle circular motion. Gently tissue offPrecautions: For external use only.

reviews.headline: Good on sensitive eczema skin!
reviews.comments: This is the only face wash I've been able to find that doesn't irritate my sensitive eczema skin. It also soothes my face when it's irritated. This stuff is amazing!

reviews.headline: Lifesaver!
reviews.comments: This is the only face wash that smoothes and doesn't irritate my sensitive eczema face.

reviews.headline: Acne, eczema, dryness
reviews.comments: I have serious cystic acne (only held in check by rounds of medication every 10 years or so), as well as eczema and dryness. I'm very fair with some freckles and a tendency towards irritation. I use the avene cleanser lotion as step #2 of a two-step cleanse, with DHC oil as step #1. As I wear sunscreen every day and make-up often, I don't think I could use it alone. But the two are so gentle and yet effective together. They've been my face cleansers for roughly 3 years now, and while my skin is by no means perfect (and likely never will be) its not enraged and uncomfortable either.

reviews.headline: I've been using for a few years now.
reviews.comments: I use this every night to wash my face. It's gentle on my skin and removes makeup. Before use, I do use an eye make up remover and then wash. Also have used it on airplane's or camping because you don't have to rinse it off. I usually do rinse at home though.

reviews.headline: The only thing that didnt make my face burn
reviews.comments: I'm pretty sure that i damaged my skin barrier completely by constantly trying new skin care products ugh... It got to the point that it looked like i had hives all over my face from how irritated my skin got after cleansing with my usual daily cleanser. I switched out to the sensitive cleansers from cetaphil to cerave and neither worked even vanicream that is said to be for extremely sensitive skin burned. Then i was recommended this one and it really is the only thing that helped my skin T_T It is light enough to not irritate my face but also leaves it quite soft after using i would definitely recommend. Now i just need to find a good moisturizer... I have combination skin btw but now its leaning more to dry

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin sadly
reviews.comments: I bought this today at the store and i got it because it say it is extremely gentle and for sensitive reactive skin. But when i washed my face with it, my skin was all red everywhere..i was very surprised! I wouldn't recommend if you are really sensitive or have sensitive skin! But that is just my experience with this.

reviews.headline: SECOND STEP in a 2-step Cleansing Routine
reviews.comments: I have been using this cleanser for 2-3 years, but as the SECOND step in a 2-step cleansing routine. It wouldn't be enough to take off makeup and sunscreen. I start with DHC deep cleansing oil (rubbed on a dry face, as per the instructions) and then after I rinse that off in the shower I use the Avene extremely gentle cleaner as the second cleanse. I also use it in the mornings when I wake up, as many dermatologists recommend that those with sensitive skin only splash their face with water in the morning or use something as profoundly gentle as this cleanser is. I find it very useful and imagine I'll continue to use it indefinitely. Again, it's not appropriate after an entire day out and about with sunscreen and/or make up on.

reviews.headline: Gentle but doesn't cleanse well
reviews.comments: Agree with reviews that say this is extremely gentle but doesn't clean effectively. For the couple of weeks I used the Avene cleanser, I had visibly clogged pores and buildup in areas that usually would not be problem areas. Reccomend in the instance that you're dealing with a rash or irritation on the face. But this didn't personally work as an overall everyday cleanser

reviews.headline: Just doesn't remove makeup
reviews.comments: I wanted this to work, since id heard great things aboht avene. Unfortunately i just couldnt get this to remove any makeup. I finallg realized this when using it to remove makeup off the back of my hand and despite much rubbing nothing came off. Super bummed

reviews.headline: Good, but not for my skin
reviews.comments: This cleanser I have used for a year and a half, and it cleanses the easy surface areas on your face very well without stripping the skin. Like forehead, cheeks, etc. But it does not do well cleaning the harder areas even when double cleansing, like the nose. My nose personally clogs up a lot because I am very oily and have many blackheads, but if thats not a problem for you I say you would like this product. (Also there is no fragrance lol)

reviews.headline: Good, but not for my skin
reviews.comments: This cleanser I have used for a year and a half, and it cleanses the easy surface areas on your face very well without stripping the skin. Like forehead, cheeks, etc. But it does not do well cleaning the harder areas even when double cleansing, like the nose. My nose personally clogs up a lot because I am very oily and have many blackheads, but if thats not a problem for you I say you would like this product. (Also there is no fragrance lol)

reviews.headline: Recommend for damaged skin barrier
reviews.comments: I bought this product back in 2021 recommended by a store associate when they told me my skin barrier was most likely damaged. My skin started healing and stopped breaking out within a couple of weeks. Highly recommend to anyone w/ sensitive skin

reviews.headline: Eczema Skin Saver
reviews.comments: I have had eczema since I was a baby and i have tried almost every single clenser out there that claimed to be gentle on the skin. Let me tell you, eczema guys and gals, look no further.

reviews.headline: My favorite cleanser!
reviews.comments: This is the best cleanser I have ever used! I have sensitive skin and psoriasis this is amazing! It leaves my skin with a beautiful glow and is so gentle! Would recommend!

reviews.headline: THE most "gentle" gentle cleanser!
reviews.comments:
If "gentle" cleansers aren't gentle enough for you, this is IT. It's in the name - extremely gentle. My combo, acne-prone, reactive and sensitive skin can attest.

The thin, lotion-like consistency will throw some people off and would not be a foaming cleanser person's cup of tea, but it's the only cleanser I've found that truly cleans gently. All the big name gentle cleansers have been stripping enough and not replenishing enough to compete.

I use it as my only cleanser with light to no makeup, and as a second cleanse after an oil-based cleanser if I wear foundation. Micellar water to take off my mascara, before.

reviews.headline: Great for removing makeup, breakout free!!
reviews.comments: I bought this abroad on a recommendation from my French BFF, and it is amazing for removing eye makeup! I can't use oil cleansers because they break me out, but this cleanser has a similar texture and breaks down makeup just as well. I personally would only use this when i double cleanse, I can't imagine it doing a whole lot of cleansing by itself.

reviews.headline: Great for very sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This is great to have on hand for morning cleansing. I don't understand how it works without rinsing it off (and sometimes I still do), but cleans well and gently. Not the best for removing makeup, but perfect for a fresh morning face.

reviews.headline: Don't feel clean after wash
reviews.comments: Too watery… need to use on a damp wash cloth so it doesn't run down your hand. Not worth the money.

reviews.headline: My favorite gentle cleanser!
reviews.comments: I use this in combination with an oil/balm cleanser (TO squalane cleanser)to get a really effective and gentle double cleanse. What I like about this product is I can either use it as a first or second cleanse. As a first cleanse, I use it with a cotton round and wipe away makeup and sunscreen with it. As a second cleanse, I just use It with my hands and rinse it with water even if that's not how its meant to be used but it rinses off really well regardless! Don't want to be without this.

reviews.headline: didn't clean and dried out my skin
reviews.comments: gave this cleanser a solid couple months but it did a horrible job cleaning my skin and left it very dry and Irritated. I have sensitive skin and since this is supposed to be gentle I was very hopeful. I'm usually a big fan of avene products but this one just didn't work for me.

media.caption: This cleanser is good for sensitive skin because it's not harsh and it's fragrance free. It's hydrating and provides moisture to the skin. Pro tip: try adding this on your neck.

media.headline: It's everything it says it is!
media.caption: Avène Tolerance Extremely Gentle Cleanser Sample

media.headline: Very gentle cleanser. I love it!

faceoff_positive.comments: Love this. It took me a couple uses to adjust to it, as I've never used a cleanser like it before. It's like a thin lotion. I dampen my face before using it, and I do use a damp cloth to gently wipe off what remains after washing my face. My skin is clean *and* moisturized after using, which is awesome, and I haven't needed as much other products afterward to restore and protect my skin barrier like I would with other face washes that make my skin tight, dry, flaky, and itchy after using them. I have very sensitive and reactive skin, it dries out very easily. This wash is lovely. It does not claim to be a makeup remover, so I wouldn't expect it to remove heavy eye makeup or foundation very easily. But I almost never wear make up on my skin, and I use an eye makeup remover, specifically, for that. Also, this product is fragrance free which is essential for sensitive and reactive skin. I almost sent it back after the first use, I'm glad I figured out to apply to a damp face, because I really love it.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love this face wash

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have sensitive, dry skin. Most days I wear an  SPF lotion with no makeup. Some days I wear just foundation, powder, mascara and brow.  

I was excited about trying a sample of Avene Tolerance Extremely Gentle Cleanser.  I know about the products and their spring water.  

The bottle of the sample I tried was very small. The cleanser itself has a milky serum texture with a pleasant scent.  This wipe-off cleanser is just as gentle as claimed.  Kept my skin clam with no burning or stinging irritation.  I found there was still residual makeup left unless I used the product twice.  I also tried applying in the shower then rinsing off; this method also required two applications to get the (not very much) eye makeup off.  If I used only one application, I had to follow up with a second product to remove eye makeup.  

While I like the idea of Avene's cleanser, a product that requires a second step does me no favors.  I'm looking for things that make my life less complicated, not adding more tasks.  I'm left feeling that this isn't an everyday cleanser, only for the days my face is free of makeup or when I happen to be in a stretch of sensitivity.   It's great despite it's limitations, but not for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: Extremely Gentle not Extremely Clean
